description:
This is in relation to my previous case i raised . Post this I have given a police statement to Police Scotland Case number Incident Number: PS-20251103-0779 Crime Report Number: CR/0467681/25 Crime Type: FRAUD However i have seen no further progress . Looking at the below I ahve located the suspect Bybit Wallet potentially. I've given this information to the police  , Could anybody here help me reference reaching out to the exchange for my previous funds. There is $27m USD on the suspects bybit wallet ....Large amount of Solana moved from suspect wallet  Wallet ID - 8PKWBMP2UWojbDcrvSFL8R79PefSwG1ziSoJgdd4fWDm (15 Solana - $2,101.15)Transaction IDKQLo2sn63L93iGj7HjnkqXab4v5FXDhBjoBdKA58X3hAQH5xB2KqujWp86WQFJM8TG8AuPzUtR3nFZW9XQyCo7W Second move to a separate wallet  Wallet ID -EqEAGvDN9W8dJeF4GLLh5AHyT5aiePwr5E2KDhCDk6qJ (15 Solana - $2,101.15)2WxPbizRL326h69ofyA4n3XW6HXMfAg6dQYPbxZQAycYpQZo1VhqpNUvRHNVoHhwEZsZEEuxHGCfdBUTxboPgwAuFrom suspect wallet to EXCHANGE WALLET  Bybit Wallet 10 .Wallet ID iGdFcQoyR2MwbXMHQskhmNsqddZ6rinsipHc4TNSdwu This is how you may identify the suspect by reaching out to the exchange . The suspect would have had to KYC himself with his ID ( Passport / licence etc ) and a selfie . His current wallet balance is $27,974,447.8

This is in relation to my previous case i raised . Post this I have given a police statement to Police Scotland Case number Incident Number: PS-20251103-0779 Crime Report Number: CR/0467681/25 Crime Type: FRAUD However i have seen no further progress . Looking at the below I ahve located the suspect Bybit Wallet potentially. I've given this information to the police  , Could anybody here help me reference reaching out to the exchange for my previous funds. There is $27m USD on the suspects bybit wallet ....Large amount of Solana moved from suspect wallet

Wallet ID - 8PKWBMP2UWojbDcrvSFL8R79PefSwG1ziSoJgdd4fWDm (15 Solana - $2,101.15)Transaction ID
